Package equipments.Fridge

package equipments.Fridge

Fridge component for the Household Energy Management project.

Licence

Copyright Jacques Malenfant, Sorbonne Universite.

Jacques.Malenfant@lip6.fr

This software is a computer program whose purpose is to provide a basic household management systems as an example of a cyber-physical system.

This software is governed by the CeCILL-C license under French law and abiding by the rules of distribution of free software. You can use, modify and/ or redistribute the software under the terms of the CeCILL-C license as circulated by CEA, CNRS and INRIA at the following URL http://www.cecill.info.

As a counterpart to the access to the source code and rights to copy, modify and redistribute granted by the license, users are provided only with a limited warranty and the software's author, the holder of the economic rights, and the successive licensors have only limited liability.

In this respect, the user's attention is drawn to the risks associated with loading, using, modifying and/or developing or reproducing the software by the user in light of its specific status of free software, that may mean that it is complicated to manipulate, and that also therefore means that it is reserved for developers and experienced professionals having in-depth computer knowledge. Users are therefore encouraged to load and test the software's suitability as regards their requirements in conditions enabling the security of their systems and/or data to be ensured and, more generally, to use and operate it in the same conditions as regards security.

The fact that you are presently reading this means that you have had knowledge of the CeCILL-C license and that you accept its terms.

This package defines a thermostated heater component used in the Household Energy Management project.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    equipments.Fridge.connections
     
    equipments.Fridge.mil
     
  • Class
    Description
    CVMUnitTest
    The class CVMUnitTest performs unit tests for the thermostated air conditiong component.
    Fridge
    The class Fridge a Fridge component.
    FridgeExternalControlCI
    The component interface HeaterExternalControlCI declares the signatures of services used by the household energy manager to adjust the power consumption of the heater.
    FridgeInternalControlCI
    The component interface FridgeInternalControlCI declares the signatures of services used by the thermostat inside the fridge to control its temperature
    FridgeInternalControlI
    The interface AirConditioningInternalControlI defines the signatures of the services offered by the air conditioning to its thermostat controller.
    FridgeTester
    The class FridgeTester implements a component performing tests for the class Fridge as a BCM component.
    FridgeUserAndControlI
    The interface AirConditioningUserAndControlI declares the signatures of the methods corresponding both to actions performed by users and by the controllers on the fridge.
    FridgeUserAndExternalControlI
    The interface AirConditioningUserAndExternalControlI declares the signatures of service implementations accessible both to the user and to the external controller.
    FridgeUserCI
    The component interface FridgeUserCI declares the signature of the services offered and that can be required by the user from the fridge.
    FridgeUserImplI
    The interface FridgeConditioningUserImplI declares the signature of the methods corresponding to actions performed by users on the fridge: switching on and off, setting the target temperature, etc.
